root.name: Civil War: A Nation Divided
root.description: Civil War: A Nation Divided is a first person shooter set during the infamous war that took place in America in the 1800s. Players take control of both a Union and a Confederate soldier and fight in well known battles, including Gettysburg. The game features different kinds of muskets and rifles, as well as pistols and even an early version of the grenade.Union BattlesA battle sceneFredericksburgGettysburgChattanoogaFort FisherSelmaPetersburgConfederate BattlesSoldiers engaging in close quarters combatBull RunShilohAntietamChancellorsvilleChickamaugaCold HarborThe weapons in the game are accurately portrayed, featuring single shot weapons with lengthy reload times. Melee also plays a large role in the game as it did during the war, and players can make use of bayonets, swords, and knives. The game also has leaderboards, but no multiplayer. The main menu hints at DLC, but as of yet, none has been released.
